GSD.product_version: versions from v5.7 to before v5.10.155
GSD.description:
bpftool: Fix NULL pointer dereference when pin {PROG, MAP, LINK} without FILE

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.155 by commit 8c80b2fca4112d724dde477aed13f7b0510a2792, it was introduced in version v5.7 by commit 75a1e792c335b5c6d7fdb1014da47aeb64c5944f. For more details please see the references link.
